meanings.definition: Ornamental decoration consisting of spirals or curves resembling the shape of a scroll.
meanings.sent1: The intricate scrollwork on the gate added a touch of elegance to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The artist used delicate scrollwork to embellish the frame of the mirror.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to mimic the scrollwork pattern with its tail.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so beautiful, it looked like scrollwork dancing on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The scrollwork on the antique vase told a story of ancient craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: Decorative design or pattern featuring scrolls or spirals.
meanings.sent1: The intricate scrollwork on the furniture gave the room a regal feel.
meanings.sent2: The scrollwork on the iron gate was both functional and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully chased its tail, creating a whirlwind of scrollwork.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall of golden scrollwork.
meanings.sent5: The scrollwork on the wedding invitations added a touch of sophistication to the event.
